name: part_004
file: tmp_【 #大空スバル５周年 】大空スバル５周年記念ライブ ～ 5th Anniversary Live Stellar Symphony ～【ホロライブ⧸大空スバル】 [GEgMPHX6_c8]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_004.mov

scenes.description: Oozora Subaru talks to the audience on stage, concluding the first 'idol-like' part of her live and teasing changes for the next section.
Oozora Subaru performs the song 'Kimagure Mercy'.
Oozora Subaru performs the song 'Marshall Maximizer' with backup dancers.

subtitles.original: はい、ということでですね、
subtitles.english: Alright, and with that...

subtitles.original: ま、ここで前半のちょっとアイドルっぽいパートが１つ終わり。
subtitles.english: the first 'idol-like' part of the first half is over.

subtitles.original: そしてこっからはね、またちょっと何かが変わるかもしれませんで、
subtitles.english: And from here on, things might change a little bit,

subtitles.original: ぜひそのあたりもお楽しみにしていってください！
subtitles.english: so please look forward to that as well!

subtitles.original: それでは次の曲はこちら！
subtitles.english: Now then, here is the next song!

subtitles.original: 気まぐれメルシィ
subtitles.english: Kimagure Mercy

subtitles.original: ほらほらまた始まった
subtitles.english: Look, look, it's starting again

subtitles.original: お得意の自己弁護言い訳
subtitles.english: Your specialty: self-defense and excuses

subtitles.original: でもね
subtitles.english: But you see...

subtitles.original: だって
subtitles.english: Because...

subtitles.original: ほらほらまた始まった
subtitles.english: Look, look, it's starting again

subtitles.original: ごめんからのキスのパターンの感じ
subtitles.english: That 'Sorry' followed by a kiss routine

subtitles.original: 安易
subtitles.english: Too easy

subtitles.original: いつかあたしだけ そんな夢見たこともあったけど
subtitles.english: I once dreamed it would be only me, but...

subtitles.original: 寂しい時だけ電話してもうんざりだわ
subtitles.english: Calling me only when you're lonely... I'm sick of it

subtitles.original: 全然あたしに興味ないじゃん
subtitles.english: You're not interested in me at all, are you?

subtitles.original: 君が好きなのは自分自身でしょ
subtitles.english: The only one you love is yourself, right?

subtitles.original: やっぱりあたしに興味ないじゃん
subtitles.english: As I thought, you're not interested in me

subtitles.original: その話もう聞き飽きたわ
subtitles.english: I'm tired of hearing that story

subtitles.original: そもそも大体あたしに興味ないじゃん
subtitles.english: In the first place, you don't care about me

subtitles.original: そうやってまた誤魔化して
subtitles.english: Glossing it over like that again

subtitles.original: Be my boy わがまま過ぎるベイビー
subtitles.english: Be my boy, you're such a selfish baby

subtitles.original: 抱きしめてよね
subtitles.english: Hold me tight, okay?

subtitles.original: ほんと君はしょうもないな
subtitles.english: You're really hopeless

subtitles.original: 甘いあたししょうがないな
subtitles.english: And I'm too soft on you, I can't help it

subtitles.original: 泣いちゃって言ったって代わりゃしないや
subtitles.english: Even if I cry and say it, nothing changes

subtitles.original: もう少しくらいなら 踊ってもいいかもな
subtitles.english: Maybe I could dance just a little longer

subtitles.original: とろけて溶けてきたの
subtitles.english: I'm starting to melt away

subtitles.original: どんなアピールも意味ないし
subtitles.english: No matter how I try to get your attention, it's meaningless

subtitles.original: 気づいてくれないけど
subtitles.english: You don't even notice

subtitles.original: あたしが寂しい時だって 会いに来て
subtitles.english: Even when I'm lonely, come and see me

subtitles.original: 全然あたしに興味ないじゃん
subtitles.english: You're not interested in me at all, are you?

subtitles.original: どこがダメなのか教えてよ
subtitles.english: Tell me what's wrong with me

subtitles.original: やっぱりあたしに興味ないじゃん
subtitles.english: As I thought, you're not interested in me

subtitles.original: 携帯ばかり弄ってさ
subtitles.english: Just staring at your phone

subtitles.original: そもそも大体あたしに興味ないじゃん
subtitles.english: In the first place, you don't care about me

subtitles.original: 少し位期待させて
subtitles.english: Give me a little hope

subtitles.original: Lonely Girl 独り占めしてよベイビー
subtitles.english: Lonely Girl, keep me all to yourself, baby

subtitles.original: 振り回さないで
subtitles.english: Don't toy with me

subtitles.original: Mayday Mercy 1,2 shall we dance?
subtitles.english: Mayday Mercy 1, 2, shall we dance?

subtitles.original: 踊りましょう
subtitles.english: Let's dance

subtitles.original: 早く手を繋いで
subtitles.english: Hurry up and hold my hand

subtitles.original: 最後に一つだけ
subtitles.english: Just one last thing

subtitles.original: 溺れる位愛してよ
subtitles.english: Love me until I drown in it

subtitles.original: 全然あたしに興味ないじゃん
subtitles.english: You're not interested in me at all, are you?

subtitles.original: 君が好きなのは自分自身でしょ
subtitles.english: The only one you love is yourself, right?

subtitles.original: やっぱりあたしに興味ないじゃん
subtitles.english: As I thought, you're not interested in me

subtitles.original: その話もう聞き飽きたわ
subtitles.english: I'm tired of hearing that story

subtitles.original: そもそも大体あたしに興味ないじゃん
subtitles.english: In the first place, you don't care about me

subtitles.original: そうやってまた誤魔化して
subtitles.english: Glossing it over like that again

subtitles.original: Get a last dance 覚悟は出来てるの
subtitles.english: Get a last dance, I'm prepared

subtitles.original: 気まぐれメルシィ
subtitles.english: Kimagure Mercy

subtitles.original: お味はいかが？
subtitles.english: How does it taste?

subtitles.original: マーシャル・マキシマイザー
subtitles.english: Marshall Maximizer

subtitles.original: 喧々、臨界実験につき合う朝
subtitles.english: A noisy morning accompanying a critical experiment

subtitles.original: 14ポンド笑うベスト
subtitles.english: A 14-pound laughing vest

subtitles.original: 「如何しようもないの」
subtitles.english: "There's nothing I can do"

subtitles.original: 気が狂う人のフリをしてる君を見ている
subtitles.english: I'm watching you pretend to be someone going mad

subtitles.original: 燦々、面倒だったから切り捨てた
subtitles.english: Brilliant, I cut it off because it was a bother

subtitles.original: 4U型を攫う掃句
subtitles.english: A sweeping phrase that snatches the 4U type

subtitles.original: 「申し訳ないけど」
subtitles.english: "I'm sorry, but..."

subtitles.original: すれ違いもなしに奪い寄せて遠回ししてる
subtitles.english: Bringing it close without a miss, being indirect

subtitles.original: 「夜更かしはイドの暴走」
subtitles.english: "Staying up late is the ego's rampage"

subtitles.original: 「目に焼き付いた胃の感光」
subtitles.english: "The stomach's exposure burned into the eyes"

subtitles.original: モラトリアム的人生
subtitles.english: A moratorium-like life

subtitles.original: 最大公約数
subtitles.english: The greatest common divisor

subtitles.original: 食べて すぐ寝て 牛になる
subtitles.english: Eat, sleep right away, turn into a cow

subtitles.original: 起きて また寝て 人でなし
subtitles.english: Wake up, sleep again, a good-for-nothing

subtitles.original: マキシマイザー！ マキシマイザー！
subtitles.english: Maximizer! Maximizer!

subtitles.original: 挙手で合図を待って 壊したってとっ強行
subtitles.english: Wait for the signal by hand, force it even if broken

subtitles.original: なんて事だ死んでしまう
subtitles.english: Good grief, I'm going to die

subtitles.original: だがツマミは回る ガンジガラメ
subtitles.english: But the knob turns, bound hand and foot

subtitles.original: サングコステラ！ サングコステラ！
subtitles.english: Sangcostella! Sangcostella!

subtitles.original: 同一体 終いには
subtitles.english: The same entity, in the end
